description:
Python is a general-purpose interpreted, interactive, object-oriented and high-level programming language. Python was created by Guido van Rossum in the late eighties and early nineties. Like Perl, Python source code is also now available under the GNU General Public License (GPL)

Some of the good features of python are:

  • Easy - to - Learn
  • Easy - to - read
  • Easy - to - maintain
  • Python is beginners language
  • Interactive
  • Portability

Python is now used in almost all the popular websites, some of them are youtube, bittorrent, google, spotify, yahoo maps, reditt, quora, instagram and many more. It is the most simplest and the most powerful programming language available in the market today.

This is the course which teaches you vital topics in python. You can quickly go through for refresh and learning what are the topics and see some examples in the python.

The original python programming tutorial for beginners covers all the topics from basic to advanced are covered with examples to understand the concepts better. Once you complete the course you will be able to write complex code using python.I am sure you are going to love the python than any other programming language for rest of your life.

The original tutorial has been designed for software programmers with a need to understand the Python programming language starting from scratch. This tutorial will give you enough understanding on Python programming language from where you can take yourself to a higher level of expertise.
title: python programming quick look
